hero.CAFE_SLOGAN: Sharing our culture, one dessert at a time

about.SPECIALIZATION: We specialize in popular pastries, foods, and drinks from our Japanese, Mexican, and American cultures!
about.ABOUT_TAGLINE: LET'S GET TO KNOW EACH OTHER BETTER
about.MOE_DESCRIPTION: Moe has been baking for over 10 years. She truly enjoys the process of creating delicious treats from scratch!
about.JUAN_DESCRIPTION: Juan likes trying new recipes and learning all the new skills that come with a cafe. He enjoys Mexican food.
about.MOKO_DESCRIPTION: Moko is our lovely son. He is a spoiled boy but he is very kind and adventurous. He loves chicken.
about.FAMILY_DESCRIPTION: Our small family wants to say thank you for visiting our site and welcomes you to visit our cafe.

menu-landing.MENU_TAGLINE: WE HAVE A CHAIR READY FOR YOU!
menu-landing.DESSERTS_INFO: We offer over 12 dessert options for your sweet tooth! Many of them only available here in all of the Horukiru area.
menu-landing.FOOD_INFO: Our speciality is Tex-Mex! We have 3 diferent burritos available. Chicken, Carnits, and Veggie. All three packed with flavor!
menu-landing.DRINKS_INFO: We have all the tasty coffee based drinks you've come to know! Plus, a few extra special drinks for those who prefer something sweeter.
menu-landing.SPECIALS_INFO: Be on the lookout for special desserts, drinks, and food! We love offering creative items based on the season or special holidays!

gallery-landing.WONDERFUL_DESCRIPTION: It's always a joyous time when our customers bring their lovely pets together to see us! Thank you!
gallery-landing.LIFE_IN_COLOR: The little moments of life in color!
gallery-landing.LIFE_IN_COLOR_DESCRIPTION: Life is about making wondeful memories with your family, your friends, your pets, or yourself. Go out and have a cookie!
